long_description: To craft the Traveller's pack, craft together a white bed, crafting table and 2 leather. You can also add a smoker as well (see screenshots)
name: mcl_travelpack
short_description: The traveller's pack is a basic alternative to backpack mods. It condenses essential travel items into 1 inventory slot so that you have extra space to carry loot
title: Travellers Pack
